description: This file contains unit tests for MongoDB integration utilities within a backend project. It specifically tests the behavior of a stand-in database object to ensure that code does not inadvertently evaluate database objects as booleans, which could lead to bugs.

classes.name: _BoolExplodingDb
classes.description: A mock database class that raises an exception when evaluated in a boolean context to prevent improper usage in production.

methods.name: _BoolExplodingDb.__bool__
methods.description: Overrides the boolean evaluation to raise NotImplementedError, simulating a database object that should not be directly evaluated in boolean contexts.

methods.name: _BoolExplodingDb.command
methods.description: Asynchronously simulates sending a command to the database, returning a success indicator.

methods.name: None test_ping_does_not_bool_evaluate_db()
methods.description: Asynchronously tests that the MongoClientManager's ping method does not evaluate the database object in a boolean context, using the mock database object.
